basic.description: This course explores the role of content, pedagogy, curriculum, and technology in promoting learning and impacting equity. Topics cover discourse in the classroom, diversity, equity, and classroom learning opportunities as well as assessment  methods for understanding student learning. FSU-Teach students teach a multi-day lesson with a peer, in a secondary-school setting.
basic.subject: SMT
basic.title: Classroom Interactions (FSU-Teach)
